Mod1_Description: {c_important}Storm Strike{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_12} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds.
Mod3_Description: {c_important}Storm Strike{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Immobilize all enemies hit for {c_number}[{buffduration:IMMOBILIZE}|1|]{/c} seconds.
name: Storm Strike
